title: Consolidating Multiple Wells to a Tube using CSV
author: Opentrons
description: This protocol allows your robot to consolidate wells from a 96-well plate to a single tube. Depending on the total consolidation volume, the destination can be either a 15 mL or 50 mL tube. Volume and well information are uploaded as a CSV file, see more details in Additional Notes.
process:
Upload a CSV file containing information of well and volume to transfer.
Download the protocol for the appropriate robot.

Depending on the total consolidation volume, the destination can be either a 15 mL or 50 mL tube. Volume and well information are uploaded as a CSV file, see more details in Additional Notes.
markdown.process:

2. Download the protocol for the appropriate robot.
